data.name: Loren the Amazon Princess - Bonus Content
data.detailed_description:
Please Note: once purchased, the bonus content will appear in the game root installation directory, in a subdirectory called "- bonus content".

Loren Bonus Content features the full game soundtrack and 14 different wallpapers, one for each main character of the story.

The full OST includes the songs:

  • Enter the Fray 04:41
  • The Chosen 01:58
  • Level Up! 02:49
  • Mystical Wonder 04:40
  • Inside the Castle of N'mar 02:41
  • Dark Elves Village 01:40
  • In Good Spirits 02:32
  • The March 04:31
  • Intense Combat 02:47
  • A Dangerous World 00:52
  • Sauzer's Theme 00:59
  • Peaceful 02:38
  • Stand Strong and Fight! 01:35
  • This is Despair 04:33
  • Pleasant Stay At the Inn 02:30
  • Peril in Hammerhands 01:37
  • Romance and Affection 01:48
  • The Alliance 00:52
  • To Lothark 01:50
  • Temple of Healing 02:42
